topics.body:

I haven't kept up to date since I've been preoccupied with renovating my home. 
Also does mozzarella go well with high quality beef? I'm trying to make a burger which doesn't suck, or taste like soggy bread.

topics.body:
Guys, I've got a problem...
I'm trying to watch the magical boy anime, but I seem to be unable to watch it.
It's like every fiber of my body is trying to tell me "screw the magical boys, watch your epic Titan show you idiot" and I can't seem to fight it off...

I think I need help.
topics.author: 536f7a11636872666e2d0000

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54c03bf26368727ab6e20100#post_54c03bf26368727ab6e20100
Oh wow actually?


Every time I get fresh out of the shower, and my hair is clean and dried, I notice I have actually quite girly hair
And whilst shaven, I have apparently been mistaken for a girl, from a distance at least 

I could totally be a trap
